name: Alex Carter
persona: Alex is a 20-year-old psychology major who has struggled significantly with academic performance, as reflected in a very low CGPA. They often find it difficult to stay organized and motivated, and rarely feel confident in their ability to succeed in coursework. While Alex does not experience overwhelming test anxiety, their low self-discipline and perseverance make it challenging to keep up with assignments and study routines. They are aware of their academic struggles but have yet to find effective strategies to improve their outcomes.
